titles.title: This Do in Remembrance of Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The trial of the cross was approaching With its bitterness, sorrow and pain, When there in the upper room, Jesus Spoke with His disciples again.

verse.name: c
v2
verse.lines: Then take of the bread to remember That His body was broken for you; And drink of the cup to remember His blood that was shed for you too.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The Saviour now liveth in glory, Triumphant o'er death and o'er sin; Until He shall come for His dear ones, Do this in remembrance of Him.

verse.name: c
v4
verse.lines: The Son of God gave to His children This token in mem'ry of Him; Come, take of the bread of life freely, And let His blood cleanse you from sin.
